pageTitle: growing edamame | Just Bento Community Forum
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {18251=Edamame can be grown like bush beans (haricot beans). Plant them in April-May, and they should crop in late July-August. You need to plant a lot of plants to have enough edamame, so try to stagger your harvest so you have a constant supply.}
